com.percussion.util
Class PSExtensionInstallTool

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.util.PSExtensionInstallTool

public class PSExtensionInstallTool
extends Object

This class is used to bootstrap the extension manager and manipulate it without having to load the entire server.

Constructor Summary
PSExtensionInstallTool(File serverDir)
          Initialize the install tool in the given directory, which represents the "Extensions/" directory under the server root.

Constructor Detail

PSExtensionInstallTool

public PSExtensionInstallTool(File serverDir)
                       throws IOException,
                              PSExtensionException
Initialize the install tool in the given directory, which represents the "Extensions/" directory under the server root. If an existing extension manager is already installed in this location, all configuration information will be migrated to the new model.

Parameters:
serverDir - The server directory. Must not be null.
Throws:
IOException - if any IO operation fails.
PSExtensionException - if any extension installation fails.
Method Detail

main

public static void main(String[] args)
Installs the extensions from the provided resource directory to the supplied server directory.

Parameters:
args - takes two arguments, argument 0 is the server directory while argument 1 is the resource directory.

InstallExtensions

public static void InstallExtensions(Document doc,
                                     String serverDir,
                                     String resourceDir)
                              throws Exception
Install (or register) extensions from the supplied document

Parameters:
doc - the document that contains the to be installed extensions. If the supplied extensions already exist in the current system, then the existing extensions will be replaced with the supplied ones. Never null.
serverDir - the Rhythmyx root directory, never null or empty.
resourceDir - the resource directory, never null or empty. It is only used when the supplied document contains resources; otherwise it is not used.
Throws:
Exception - if an error occurs during the installation (or registration) process.

installJavaHandler

public void installJavaHandler()
                        throws PSExtensionException,
                               com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNonUniqueException,
                               com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException
Installs the Java extension handler if it is not already installed.

Throws:
PSExtensionException - If the extension definition fails the handler's validation rules or if the extension could not be loaded (some implementations may defer loading until prepareExtension is called), or if the extension handler could not be started. In any case, the defined extension will not be installed.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException - If the appropriate extension handler does not exist. The defined extension will not be installed.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNonUniqueException - If the extension already exists. Use updateExtension instead. The defined extension will not be installed.

installJavaScriptHandler

public void installJavaScriptHandler()
                              throws PSExtensionException,
                                     com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNonUniqueException,
                                     com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException
Installs the JavaScript extension handler if it is not already installed.

Throws:
PSExtensionException - If the extension definition fails the handler's validation rules or if the extension could not be loaded (some implementations may defer loading until prepareExtension is called), or if the extension handler could not be started. In any case, the defined extension will not be installed.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException - If the appropriate extension handler does not exist. The defined extension will not be installed.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNonUniqueException - If the extension already exists. Use updateExtension instead. The defined extension will not be installed.

getExtensionManager

public com.percussion.extension.IPSExtensionManager getExtensionManager()
Returns the initialized extension manager instance.

Returns:
the extension manager instance, never null.

installExtensions

public void installExtensions(Document extensions,
                              File resourceRoot)
                       throws PSExtensionException,
                              IOException,
                              com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNonUniqueException,
                              com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException
Installs all of the given extensions. If the extensions already exist, they will be updated rather than installed.

Parameters:
extensions - The extensions document, containing zero or more <Extension> elements, not null.
resourceRoot - The root directory where referenced resources will be found, not null.
Throws:
PSExtensionException - If the extension definition fails the handler's validation rules or if the extension could not be loaded (some implementations may defer loading until prepareExtension is called), or if the extension handler could not be started. In any case, the defined extension will not be installed.
IOException - if any IO operation fails.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException - If the appropriate extension handler does not exist. The defined extension will not be installed.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNonUniqueException - If the extension already exists. Use updateExtension instead. The defined extension will not be installed.

installExtension

public void installExtension(Element extElement,
                             File resourceRoot)
                      throws PSExtensionException,
                             IOException,
                             com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNonUniqueException,
                             com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException
Installs all of the given extensions. If the extensions already exist, they will be updated rather than installed.

Parameters:
extElement - The extension element, not null.
resourceRoot - The root directory where referenced resources will be found, not null.
Throws:
PSExtensionException - If the extension definition fails the handler's validation rules or if the extension could not be loaded (some implementations may defer loading until prepareExtension is called), or if the extension handler could not be started. In any case, the defined extension will not be installed.
IOException - if any IO operation fails.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException - If the appropriate extension handler does not exist. The defined extension will not be installed.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNonUniqueException - If the extension already exists. Use updateExtension instead. The defined extension will not be installed.

installExtension

public void installExtension(IPSExtensionDef def,
                             Iterator resources)
                      throws PSExtensionException,
                             com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNonUniqueException,
                             com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException
Installs the given extension if it does not already exists. If it already exists, it will be updated instead.

Parameters:
def - The extension definition. Must not be null.
resources - An Iterator over 0 or more non-null named IPSMimeContent objects specifying any resources that should be saved along with the extension. The resources may or may not correspond to the URLs returned from the def's getResourceLocations() method. Must not be null.
Throws:
PSExtensionException - If the extension definition fails the handler's validation rules or if the extension could not be loaded (some implementations may defer loading until prepareExtension is called), or if the extension handler could not be started. In any case, the defined extension will not be installed.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException - If the appropriate extension handler does not exist. The defined extension will not be installed.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNonUniqueException - If the extension already exists. Use updateExtension instead. The defined extension will not be installed.

close

public void close()
Closes all resources used in this class.

convertOldExits

public void convertOldExits()
                     throws IOException,
                            PSExtensionException,
                            SAXException,
                            com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException,
                            com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNonUniqueException
Deprecated. as of version 2.1.

Converts the exit directory structure from the version 1.0 format to the version 2.0 format.

Throws:
IOException - for any IO operation that fails.
PSExtensionException - If the extension definition fails the handler's validation rules or if the extension could not be loaded (some implementations may defer loading until prepareExtension is called), or if the extension handler could not be started. In any case, the defined extension will not be installed.
SAXException - for any SAX parser error.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException - If the appropriate extension handler does not exist. The defined extension will not be installed.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNonUniqueException - If the extension already exists. Use updateExtension instead. The defined extension will not be installed.
